snippet: Rafael Nadal says his ailing left wrist bothers him on his forehand but not on his backhand or serve....
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal says his ailing left wrist bothers him on his forehand but not on his backhand or serve.

headline.print_headline: Nadal Says Ailing Left Wrist Bothers Him Only on Forehand
headline.main: Nadal Says Ailing Left Wrist Bothers Him Only on Forehand
